00058         bool isLittleEndian()
00059         {
00060 #ifndef BYTE_ORDER
00061                 return true;
00062 #else
00063                 return (BYTE_ORDER == LITTLE_ENDIAN);
00064 #endif
00065         }

00067         unsigned int getOffset() {return (unsigned int)m_pistrm->tellg();}
00068         void setOffset(unsigned int ui) {m_pistrm->seekg(ui, ios::beg);}
00069         void advanceOffset(unsigned int ui) {setOffset(getOffset() + ui);}

00071         // All Affx binaries should be in Big Endian except for binary CDF file. 
00072         // This code is written from a Little Endian point of view. For x-platform use the Big Endian / Little Endian functions.
00073         double readDouble() {double d = 0; if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->read((char*)&d, sizeof(double));} return d;}
00074         float readFloat() {float f = 0; if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->read((char*)&f, sizeof(float));} return f;}
00075         int readInt() {int i = 0; if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->read((char*)&i, sizeof(int));} return i;}
00076         unsigned int readUnsignedInt() {unsigned int ui = 0; if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->read((char*)&ui, sizeof(unsigned int));}return ui;}
00077 //      __int64 readLong64() {__int64 l = 0; if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->read((char*)&l, sizeof(__int64));} return l;}
00078         short readShort() {short n = 0; if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->read((char*)&n, sizeof(short));}return n;}
00079         unsigned short readUnsignedShort() {unsigned short un = 0; if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->read((char*)&un, sizeof(unsigned short));}return un;}
00080         char readChar() {char c = 0; if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->read((char*)&c, sizeof(char));}return c;}
00081         unsigned char readUnsignedChar() {unsigned char uc = 0; if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->read((char*)&uc, sizeof(unsigned char));}return uc;}

00083         AffxString readString()
00084         {
00085                 AffxString str;
00086                 int iStringLength = readInt();
00087                 if (iStringLength > 0)
00088                 {
00089                         char* pszValue = new char[iStringLength + 1];
00090                         m_pistrm->read(pszValue, iStringLength);
00091                         pszValue[iStringLength] = 0;
00092                         str = pszValue;
00093                         delete[] pszValue;
00094                 }
00095                 return str;
00096         }
00097

00124         AffxString readWString(wchar_t* pszValue, int iStringLength)
00125         {
00126                 AffxString str;
00127                 if (iStringLength > 0)
00128                 {
00129                         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iStringLength); iIndex++)
00130                         {
00131                                 unsigned short un = readUnsignedShort();
00132                                 *(pszValue + iIndex) = (wchar_t)un;
00133                                 str += (char)(un >> 8);
00134                         }
00135                         pszValue[iStringLength] = 0;
00136                         delete[] pszValue;
00137                 }
00138                 return str;
00139         }

00141         AffxString readBigEndianHalfWString()
00142         {
00143                 AffxString str;
00144                 int iStringLength = readBigEndianInt();
00145                 iStringLength = iStringLength / 2;
00146                 if (iStringLength > 0)
00147                 {
00148                         wchar_t* pszValue = new wchar_t[iStringLength + 1];
00149                         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iStringLength); iIndex++)
00150                         {
00151                                 unsigned short un = readUnsignedShort();
00152                                 *(pszValue + iIndex) = (wchar_t)un;
00153                                 str += (char)(un >> 8);
00154                         }
00155                         pszValue[iStringLength] = 0;
00156                         delete[] pszValue;
00157                 }
00158                 return str;
00159         }

00181     short readBigEndianShort() 
00182         {
00183         int i = 0;
00184         int ch1 = readUnsignedChar();
00185         int ch2 = readUnsignedChar();
00186                 if (isLittleEndian()) {i = ((ch1 << 8) + (ch2 << 0));}
00187                 else  {i = ((ch1 << 0) + (ch2 << 8));}
00188         return (short)i;
00189     }
00190 
00191     unsigned short readBigEndianUnsignedShort() 
00192         {
00193         int i = 0;
00194         int ch1 = readUnsignedChar();
00195         int ch2 = readUnsignedChar();
00196                 if (isLittleEndian()) {i = ((ch1 << 8) + (ch2 << 0));}
00197                 else  {i = ((ch2 << 8) + (ch1 << 0));}
00198         return (unsigned short)i;
00199     }
00200 
00201     int readBigEndianInt() 
00202         {
00203                 int i = 0;
00204         int ch1 = readUnsignedChar();
00205         int ch2 = readUnsignedChar();
00206         int ch3 = readUnsignedChar();
00207         int ch4 = readUnsignedChar();
00208                 if (isLittleEndian()) {i = ((ch1 << 24) + (ch2 << 16) + (ch3 << 8) + (ch4 << 0));}
00209                 else  {i = ((ch4 << 24) + (ch3 << 16) + (ch2 << 8) + (ch1 << 0));}      
00210         return i;
00211     }
00212 
00213     unsigned int readBigEndianUnsignedInt() 
00214         {
00215                 unsigned int ui = 0;
00216         int ch1 = readUnsignedChar();
00217         int ch2 = readUnsignedChar();
00218         int ch3 = readUnsignedChar();
00219         int ch4 = readUnsignedChar();
00220                 if (isLittleEndian()) {ui = ((ch1 << 24) + (ch2 << 16) + (ch3 << 8) + (ch4 << 0));}
00221                 else  {ui = ((ch4 << 24) + (ch3 << 16) + (ch2 << 8) + (ch1 << 0));} 
00222         return ui;
00223     }

00225     float readBigEndianFloat() 
00226         {
00227                 int i = 0;
00228         int ch1 = readUnsignedChar();
00229         int ch2 = readUnsignedChar();
00230         int ch3 = readUnsignedChar();
00231         int ch4 = readUnsignedChar();
00232                 if (isLittleEndian()) {i = ((ch1 << 24) + (ch2 << 16) + (ch3 << 8) + (ch4 << 0));}
00233                 else  {i = ((ch4 << 24) + (ch3 << 16) + (ch2 << 8) + (ch1 << 0));} 
00234                 void* p = &i;
00235                 return *(float*)p;
00236 //      return (float)((float*)&i);
00237     }

00254         AffxString readBigEndianString(int iStringLength)
00255         {
00256                 AffxString str;
00257                 readBigEndianInt();
00258                 iStringLength -= 4;
00259                 if (iStringLength > 0)
00260                 {
00261                         char* pszValue = new char[iStringLength + 1];
00262                         m_pistrm->read(pszValue, iStringLength);
00263                         pszValue[iStringLength] = 0;
00264                         str = pszValue;
00265                         delete[] pszValue;
00266                 }
00267                 return str;

00271         {
00272                 int iStringLength = readBigEndianInt();
00273                 AffxString str;
00274                 if (iStringLength > 0)
00275                 {
00276                         wchar_t* pszValue = new wchar_t[iStringLength + 1];

00278                         {
00279                                 unsigned short un = readUnsignedShort();
00280                                 *(pszValue + iIndex) = (wchar_t)un;
00281                                 str += (char)(un >> 8);
00282                         }
00283                         pszValue[iStringLength] = 0;
00284                         delete[] pszValue;
00285                 }
00286                 return str;

00289     short readLittleEndianShort() 
00290         {
00291         int i = 0;
00292         int ch1 = readUnsignedChar();
00293         int ch2 = readUnsignedChar();
00294                 if (!isLittleEndian()) {i = ((ch1 << 8) + (ch2 << 0));}
00295                 else  {i = ((ch1 << 0) + (ch2 << 8));}
00296         return (short)i;
00297     }

00371         {

00373                 writeInt(iStringLength);
00374                 if (iStringLength > 0)
00375                 {

00385     void writeBigEndianShort(short i) 
00386         {
00387                 if (isLittleEndian())
00388                 {
00389                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[1]);
00390                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[0]);
00391                 }
00392                 else
00393                 {
00394                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[0]);
00395                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[1]);
00396                 }
00397     }

00400         {

00402                 {
00403                         writeUnsignedChar(((unsigned char*)&ui)[1]);
00404                         writeUnsignedChar(((unsigned char*)&ui)[0]);
00405                 }
00406                 else
00407                 {
00408                         writeUnsignedChar(((unsigned char*)&ui)[0]);
00409                         writeUnsignedChar(((unsigned char*)&ui)[1]);
00410                 }
00411     }

00413     void writeBigEndianInt(int i) 
00414         {
00415                 if (isLittleEndian())
00416                 {
00417                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[3]);
00418                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[2]);
00419                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[1]);
00420                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[0]);
00421                 }
00422                 else
00423                 {
00424                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[0]);
00425                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[1]);
00426                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[2]);
00427                         writeChar(((char*)&i)[3]);
00428                 }
00429     }
00430

00441                 {
00442                         writeUnsignedChar(((unsigned char*)&ui)[0]);
00443                         writeUnsignedChar(((unsigned char*)&ui)[1]);
00444                         writeUnsignedChar(((unsigned char*)&ui)[2]);
00445                         writeUnsignedChar(((unsigned char*)&ui)[3]);
00446                 }
